Query.Sentence: WITH PUBLIC_COMPETITIONS AS (SELECT * FROM ${mainschema}.COMPETITIONS WHERE COMP_ISPUBLIC = true) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PUBLIC_COMPETITIONS #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH PUBLIC_COUNT AS ( SELECT c.COMP_ID, c.COMP_NAME, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_ISPUBLIC, count(uc.USER_) AS NUM_USERS, COUNT(UC.USER_) > 10 AS COMPLETE FROM COMPETITIONS c INNER JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS uc ON c.COMP_ID = uc.COMP_ID WHERE c.COMP_ISPUBLIC = true GROUP BY c.COMP_ID HAVING COUNT(UC.USER_) < 10) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM PUBLIC_COUNT #WHERE# #ORDER#;

WITH COMPETI AS (SELECT C.COMP_ID, C.COMP_NAME, UC.USER_, UC.UC_ID, P1.PIL_NAME AS P1NAME, P1.PIL_SURNAME AS P1SURNAME, P2.PIL_NAME AS P2NAME, P2.PIL_SURNAME AS P2SURNAME, T.TEAM_NAME, UC.UC_AVAILABLE_MONEY, UC.UC_POINTS, c.COMP_DESCRIPTION, c.COMP_CODE FROM COMPETITIONS C LEFT JOIN USERS_COMPETITIONS UC ON C.COMP_ID = UC.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN PILOTS P1 ON UC.PIL_ID_1 = P1.PIL_ID LEFT JOIN PILOTS P2 ON UC.PIL_ID_2 = P2.PIL_ID LEFT JOIN TEAMS T ON UC.TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID ORDER BY UC.UC_POINTS DESC) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM COMPETI #WHERE# #ORDER#;
